<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assisting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4777) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 4), [Sniping Duo](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=121) (Level 4), [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a ranged weapon

</column>

---

Using your last shot to gauge your accuracy, you can fire off a quick shot to interfere with a foe in combat. Make a Strike with a ranged weapon. If the Strike hits, the next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their roll, or a +2 circumstance bonus if your Strike was a critical hit.
